tool.name: ProteinInference
tool.description: Protein inference based on the number of identified peptides.
tool.command:
ProteinInference
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_min_peptides_per_protein: -min_peptides_per_protein $param_min_peptides_per_protein #end if #if $param_treat_charge_variants_separately: -treat_charge_variants_separately #end if #if $param_treat_modification_variants_separately: -treat_modification_variants_separately #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #end if

param.name: param_min_peptides_per_protein
param.label: Minimal number of peptides needed for a protein identification

param.name: param_treat_charge_variants_separately
param.label: If this flag is set, different charge variants of the same peptide sequence count as inidividual evidences

param.name: param_treat_modification_variants_separately
param.label: If this flag is set, different modification variants of the same peptide sequence count as individual evidences

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Protein inference based on the number of identified peptides.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_ProteinInference.html
